content: Hello Mister Schmidt, my name is Max Müller from Germany. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in Duisburg. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Max Müller from Germany

content: Max Müller, I am pleased to negotiate with you. Let's focus on the rental price.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content:
Thank you for considering me as a potential tenant. To start, I would like to propose a lower rental price than what one might expect for this prime location. Could we perhaps discuss an amount around 650 Euros per month? This figure considers the value of the property and my reliability as a tenant.

However, if this number doesn't work for you, I am open to further negotiations to find a mutually agreeable price.
name: Max Müller from Germany

content: I don't want to continue the negotiation, because the price you proposed is too low for me. I am looking for a higher price. Please make a higher offer if you are willing to continue negotiating.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Understanding your position better now, I would like to revise my initial offer and propose a rental price closer to 750 Euros a month. I believe this intermediate step is a fair compromise, taking into account the apartment's desirability and my dependability as a tenant. If you find this unacceptable as well, I'm sorry but I cannot go lower than my initial proposal. However, I am still open to further discussions if you're willing to reconsider this adjusted price.
name: Max Müller from Germany

content: I don't want to continue the negotiation, because the price you proposed is still too low for me. I am looking for a higher price. Please make a higher offer if you are willing to continue negotiating.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Considering your needs and my desire to secure this apartment, I will make one last attempt to reach a middle ground. How about a rental price of 800 Euros per month? This reflects a significant increase from my initial offer but remains affordable for someone in my situation. If you still deem this unsatisfactory, I apologize but I cannot offer more beyond this point as per my financial capabilities. In that case, I thank you for your time and understanding. I'm hopeful we can find a mutually beneficial solution. TERMINATE
name: Max Müller from Germany
